cab.content: OCUIIEMT IS TEE PROPERTY OP HIS BRIT AMI C MAJESTY \ S - GOVERKHEHT,) -INDEMNITY daHLAUD) BILL. 1922. (Mote by the Secretary).With reference to Cabinet 15(22), Conclusion 8, the prime Minister has approved an arrangement whereby the Indemnity (Ireland) Bill, 1922, (CP,3759) will be introduced by the Seoretary of State for V/ar and not by the Chief Secretary for Ireland.As this arrangement affects a Cabinet decision it is proposed to take note of it at the next meeting of the Cabinet.068 .RET.CABINET.(Sgd.) M.P.A. HANKEY,Secretary to the Cabinet.2, "whiteh al 1 Gar d ens, S .W., 27th June, 1922.
